column5: Heading up to Dog lake in Missanabie the week of June 13th-17th with my Son and my Dad. My Dad's friend has a retreat like center that is actually up for sale that we are staying at. He mentioned that the bugs might be bad at that time. What should I prepare for? Since we are getting free accomadations if it's too bad I guess we can just leave and go home.
Bugs...June...Not in Northern Ontario hahaha   Seriously...prepare for the worst...your gonna get it!
Bring a bug jacket...and pants... and the bug patch... and DEET...  and if you don't smoke, you should start!
Just stay home it's not worth it.   (You'll be fine out in the boat, and that's really all that matters anyway)
I'd be careful...how much does your son weigh?  You'll be fine. A little preparedness goes a long way.
